1. viec thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te duoc thuc hien theo cac phuong thuc sau day: a) thanh toan theo dinh suat la thanh toan theo dinh muc chi phi kham benh, chua benh va muc dong tinh tren moi the bao hiem y te duoc dang ky tai co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te trong mot khoang thoi gian nhat dinh; b) thanh toan theo gia dich vu la thanh toan dua tren chi phi cua thuoc, hoa chat, vat tu, thiet bi y te, dich vu ky thuat y te duoc su dung cho nguoi benh; c) thanh toan theo truong hop benh la thanh toan theo chi phi kham benh, chua benh duoc xac dinh truoc cho tung truong hop theo chan doan. 2. chinh phu quy dinh cu the viec ap dung phuong thuc thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu nay .

1. to chuc bao hiem y te thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te voi co so kham benh, chua benh theo hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te. 2. to chuc bao hiem y te thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te truc tiep cho nguoi co the bao hiem y te di kham benh, chua benh trong cac truong hop sau day: a) tai co so kham benh, chua benh khong co hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te; b) truong hop kham benh, chua benh khong dung quy dinh tai cac dieu 26, 27 va 28 cua luat nay; c) tai nuoc ngoai; d) mot so truong hop dac biet khac do bo truong bo y te quy dinh. 3. bo y te chu tri, phoi hop voi bo tai chinh quy dinh thu tuc, muc thanh toan doi voi cac truong hop quy dinh tai khoan 2 dieu nay. 4. to chuc bao hiem y te thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh tren co so vien phi theo quy dinh cua chinh phu.

1. to chuc bao hiem y te co trach nhiem tam ung kinh phi hang quy cho co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te toi thieu bang 80% chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te thuc te cua quy truoc da duoc quyet toan. doi voi co so kham benh, chua benh lan dau ky hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te thi muc tam ung lan dau toi thieu bang 80% muc kinh phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te cua mot quy theo hop dong da ky. 2. viec thanh toan, quyet toan giua co so kham benh, chua benh va to chuc bao hiem y te duoc thuc hien hang quy nhu sau: a) trong thang dau cua moi quy, co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te co trach nhiem gui bao cao quyet toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te cua quy truoc cho to chuc bao hiem y te; b) trong thoi han 30 ngay, ke tu ngay nhan duoc bao cao quyet toan cua co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te, to chuc bao hiem y te co trach nhiem xem xet va thong bao ket qua quyet toan chi phi. trong thoi han 15 ngay, ke tu ngay thong bao ket qua quyet toan, to chuc bao hiem y te phai hoan thanh viec thanh toan voi co so kham benh, chua benh. 3. trong thoi han 40 ngay, ke tu ngay nhan du ho so de nghi thanh toan cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te kham benh, chua benh theo quy dinh tai diem a va diem b khoan 2 dieu 31 cua luat nay; trong thoi han 60 ngay, ke tu ngay nhan du ho so de nghi thanh toan cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te kham benh, chua benh theo quy dinh tai diem c va diem d khoan 2 dieu 31 cua luat nay, to chuc bao hiem y te phai thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh truc tiep cho cac doi tuong nay.

1. tien dong bao hiem y te theo quy dinh cua luat nay. 2. tien sinh loi tu hoat dong dau tu cua quy bao hiem y te. 3. tai tro, vien tro cua cac to chuc, ca nhan trong nuoc va nuoc ngoai. 4. cac nguon thu hop phap khac.

1. quy bao hiem y te duoc quan ly tap trung, thong nhat, cong khai, minh bach va co su phan cap quan ly trong he thong to chuc bao hiem y te. 2. chinh phu quy dinh cu the viec quan ly quy bao hiem y te; quyet dinh nguon tai chinh de bao dam viec kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te trong truong hop mat can doi thu, chi quy bao hiem y te.

1. quy bao hiem y te duoc su dung cho cac muc dich sau day: a) thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te; b) chi phi quan ly bo may to chuc bao hiem y te theo dinh muc chi hanh chinh cua co quan nha nuoc; c) dau tu de bao toan va tang truong quy bao hiem y te theo nguyen tac an toan, hieu qua; d) lap quy du phong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te. quy du phong toi thieu bang tong chi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te cua hai quy truoc lien ke va toi da khong qua tong chi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te cua hai nam truoc lien ke. 2. truong hop cac tinh, thanh pho truc thuoc trung uong co so thu bao hiem y te lon hon so chi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te thi duoc su dung mot phan ket du de phuc vu kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te tai dia phuong. 3. chinh phu quy dinh cu the dieu nay.

1. duoc cap the bao hiem y te khi dong bao hiem y te. 2. lua chon co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te ban dau theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 26 cua luat nay. 3. duoc kham benh, chua benh. 4. duoc to chuc bao hiem y te thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh theo che do bao hiem y te. 5. yeu cau to chuc bao hiem y te, co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te va co quan lien quan giai thich, cung cap thong tin ve che do bao hiem y te. 6. khieu nai, to cao hanh vi vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem y te.

1. dong bao hiem y te day du, dung thoi han. 2. su dung the bao hiem y te dung muc dich, khong cho nguoi khac muon the bao hiem y te. 3. thuc hien cac quy dinh tai dieu 28 cua luat nay khi den kham benh, chua benh. 4. chap hanh cac quy dinh va huong dan cua to chuc bao hiem y te, co so kham benh, chua benh khi den kham benh, chua benh. 5. thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh cho co so kham benh, chua benh ngoai phan chi phi do quy bao hiem y te chi tra.
1. yeu cau to chuc bao hiem y te, co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen giai thich, cung cap thong tin ve che do bao hiem y te. 2. khieu nai, to cao hanh vi vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem y te.

1. lap ho so de nghi cap the bao hiem y te. 2. dong bao hiem y te day du, dung thoi han. 3. giao the bao hiem y te cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te. 4. cung cap day du, chinh xac thong tin, tai lieu co lien quan den trach nhiem thuc hien bao hiem y te cua nguoi su dung lao dong, cua dai dien cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te khi co yeu cau cua to chuc bao hiem y te, nguoi lao dong hoac dai dien cua nguoi lao dong. 5. chap hanh viec thanh tra, kiem tra ve viec thuc hien cac quy dinh cua phap luat ve bao hiem y te.

1. yeu cau nguoi su dung lao dong, dai dien cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te va nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te cung cap day du, chinh xac thong tin, tai lieu co lien quan den trach nhiem cua ho ve viec thuc hien bao hiem y te. 2. kiem tra, giam dinh viec thuc hien kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te; thu hoi, tam giu the bao hiem y te doi voi cac truong hop quy dinh tai dieu 20 cua luat nay. 3. yeu cau co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te cung cap ho so, benh an, tai lieu ve kham benh, chua benh de phuc vu cong tac giam dinh bao hiem y te. 4. tu choi thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te khong dung quy dinh cua luat nay hoac khong dung voi noi dung hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te. 5. yeu cau nguoi co trach nhiem boi thuong thiet hai cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te hoan tra chi phi kham benh, chua benh ma to chuc bao hiem y te da chi tra. 6. kien nghi voi co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen sua doi, bo sung chinh sach, phap luat ve bao hiem y te va xu ly to chuc, ca nhan vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem y te.

1. tuyen truyen, pho bien chinh sach, phap luat ve bao hiem y te. 2. huong dan ho so, thu tuc, to chuc thuc hien che do bao hiem y te bao dam nhanh chong, don gian va thuan tien cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te. 3. thu tien dong bao hiem y te va cap the bao hiem y te. 4. quan ly, su dung quy bao hiem y te. 5. ky hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te voi co so kham benh, chua benh. 6. thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te. 7. cung cap thong tin ve cac co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te va huong dan nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te lua chon co so kham benh, chua benh ban dau. 8. kiem tra chat luong kham benh, chua benh; giam dinh bao hiem y te. 9. bao ve quyen loi cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te; giai quyet theo tham quyen cac kien nghi, khieu nai, to cao ve che do bao hiem y te. 10. luu tru ho so, so lieu ve bao hiem y te theo quy dinh cua phap luat; ung dung cong nghe thong tin trong quan ly bao hiem y te, xay dung he co so du lieu quoc gia ve bao hiem y te. 11. to chuc thuc hien cong tac thong ke, bao cao, huong dan nghiep vu ve bao hiem y te; bao cao dinh ky hoac dot xuat khi co yeu cau ve quan ly, su dung quy bao hiem y te. 12. to chuc dao tao, boi duong nghiep vu, nghien cuu khoa hoc va hop tac quoc te ve bao hiem y te.

1. yeu cau to chuc bao hiem y te cung cap day du, chinh xac cac thong tin co lien quan den nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te, kinh phi kham benh, chua benh cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te tai co so kham benh, chua benh. 2. duoc to chuc bao hiem y te tam ung kinh phi va thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh theo hop dong kham benh, chua benh da ky. 3. kien nghi voi co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen xu ly to chuc, ca nhan vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem y te.

1. to chuc kham benh, chua benh bao dam chat luong voi thu tuc don gian, thuan tien cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te. 2. cung cap ho so benh an, tai lieu lien quan den kham benh, chua benh va thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te theo yeu cau cua to chuc bao hiem y te va co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen. 3. bao dam dieu kien can thiet cho to chuc bao hiem y te thuc hien cong tac giam dinh; phoi hop voi to chuc bao hiem y te trong viec tuyen truyen, giai thich ve che do bao hiem y te cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te. 4. kiem tra, phat hien va thong bao cho to chuc bao hiem y te nhung truong hop vi pham ve su dung the bao hiem y te; phoi hop voi to chuc bao hiem y te thu hoi, tam giu the bao hiem y te doi voi cac truong hop quy dinh tai dieu 20 cua luat nay. 5. quan ly va su dung kinh phi tu quy bao hiem y te theo dung quy dinh cua phap luat. 6. to chuc thuc hien cong tac thong ke, bao cao ve bao hiem y te theo quy dinh cua phap luat.

1. yeu cau to chuc bao hiem y te, co so kham benh, chua benh va nguoi su dung lao dong cung cap day du, chinh xac thong tin lien quan den che do bao hiem y te cua nguoi lao dong. 2. kien nghi voi co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen xu ly hanh vi vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem y te lam anh huong den quyen va loi ich hop phap cua nguoi lao dong, nguoi su dung lao dong.

1. tuyen truyen, pho bien chinh sach, phap luat ve bao hiem y te doi voi nguoi lao dong, nguoi su dung lao dong. 2. tham gia xay dung, kien nghi sua doi, bo sung chinh sach, phap luat ve bao hiem y te. 3. tham gia giam sat viec thi hanh phap luat ve bao hiem y te.
thanh tra y te thuc hien chuc nang thanh tra chuyen nganh ve bao hiem y te.

viec khieu nai va giai quyet khieu nai doi voi quyet dinh hanh chinh, hanh vi hanh chinh ve bao hiem y te, viec to cao va giai quyet to cao vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem y te duoc thuc hien theo quy dinh cua phap luat ve khieu nai, to cao.

1. tranh chap ve bao hiem y te la tranh chap lien quan den quyen, nghia vu va trach nhiem bao hiem y te giua cac doi tuong sau day: a) nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te theo quy dinh tai dieu 12 cua luat nay, nguoi dai dien cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te; b) to chuc, ca nhan dong bao hiem y te theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 13 cua luat nay; c) to chuc bao hiem y te; d) co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te. 2. tranh chap ve bao hiem y te duoc giai quyet nhu sau: a) cac ben tranh chap co trach nhiem tu hoa giai ve noi dung tranh chap; b) truong hop hoa giai khong thanh thi cac ben tranh chap co quyen khoi kien tai toa an theo quy dinh cua phap luat.

1. nguoi nao co hanh vi vi pham cac quy dinh cua luat nay va cac quy dinh khac cua phap luat co lien quan den bao hiem y te thi tuy theo tinh chat, muc do vi pham ma bi xu ly ky luat, xu phat vi pham hanh chinh hoac bi truy cuu trach nhiem hinh su, neu gay thiet hai thi phai boi thuong theo quy dinh cua phap luat. 2. co quan, to chuc, nguoi su dung lao dong co trach nhiem dong bao hiem y te ma khong dong hoac dong khong day du theo quy dinh cua phap luat thi cung voi viec phai dong du so tien chua dong, con phai nop so tien lai trong thoi gian cham dong theo muc lai suat co ban do ngan hang nha nuoc cong bo; neu khong thuc hien thi theo yeu cau cua nguoi co tham quyen xu ly vi pham hanh chinh, ngan hang, to chuc tin dung khac, kho bac nha nuoc co trach nhiem trich tien tu tai khoan tien gui cua nguoi co trach nhiem dong bao hiem y te de nop so tien chua dong, cham dong va lai cua so tien nay vao tai khoan cua quy bao hiem y te.

1. bao dam chia se rui ro giua nhung nguoi tham gia bao hiem that nghiep. 2. muc dong bao hiem that nghiep duoc tinh tren co so tien luong cua nguoi lao dong. 3. muc huong bao hiem that nghiep duoc tinh tren co so muc dong, thoi gian dong bao hiem that nghiep. 4. viec thuc hien bao hiem that nghiep phai don gian, de dang, thuan tien, bao dam kip thoi va day du quyen loi cua nguoi tham gia. 5. quy bao hiem that nghiep duoc quan ly tap trung, thong nhat, cong khai, minh bach, bao dam an toan va duoc nha nuoc bao ho.
1. tro cap that nghiep. 2. ho tro tu van, gioi thieu viec lam. 3. ho tro hoc nghe. 4. ho tro dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong.

nguoi lao dong: 1. nguoi lao dong phai tham gia bao hiem that nghiep khi lam viec theo hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec nhu sau: a) hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec khong xac dinh thoi han; b) hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec xac dinh thoi han; c) hop dong lao dong theo mua vu hoac theo mot cong viec nhat dinh co thoi han tu du 03 thang den duoi 12 thang. trong truong hop nguoi lao dong giao ket va dang thuc hien nhieu hop dong lao dong quy dinh tai khoan nay thi nguoi lao dong va nguoi su dung lao dong cua hop dong lao dong giao ket dau tien co trach nhiem tham gia bao hiem that nghiep. 2. nguoi lao dong theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu nay dang huong luong huu, giup viec gia dinh thi khong phai tham gia bao hiem that nghiep. 3. nguoi su dung lao dong tham gia bao hiem that nghiep bao gom co quan nha nuoc, don vi su nghiep cong lap, don vi vu trang nhan dan; to chuc chinh tri, to chuc chinh tri - xa hoi, to chuc chinh tri xa hoi - nghe nghiep, to chuc xa hoi, to chuc xa hoi - nghe nghiep; co quan, to chuc nuoc ngoai, to chuc quoc te hoat dong tren lanh tho viet nam; doanh nghiep, hop tac xa, ho gia dinh, ho kinh doanh, to hop tac, to chuc khac va ca nhan co thue muon, su dung lao dong theo hop dong lam viec hoac hop dong lao dong quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu nay. nguoi su dung lao dong: 1. nguoi su dung lao dong phai tham gia bao hiem that nghiep cho nguoi lao dong tai to chuc bao hiem xa hoi trong thoi han 30 ngay, ke tu ngay hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec co hieu luc. 2. hang thang, nguoi su dung lao dong dong bao hiem that nghiep theo muc quy dinh tai diem b khoan 1 dieu 57 cua luat nay va trich tien luong cua tung nguoi lao dong theo muc quy dinh tai diem a khoan 1 dieu 57 cua luat nay de dong cung mot luc vao quy bao hiem that nghiep. 3. can cu vao tinh hinh ket du cua quy bao hiem that nghiep, nha nuoc chuyen kinh phi ho tro tu ngan sach nha nuoc vao quy theo muc do chinh phu quy dinh tai khoan 3 dieu 59 cua luat nay.

1. thoi gian dong bao hiem that nghiep de xet huong bao hiem that nghiep la tong cac khoang thoi gian da dong bao hiem that nghiep lien tuc hoac khong lien tuc duoc cong don tu khi bat dau dong bao hiem that nghiep cho den khi nguoi lao dong cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec theo quy dinh cua phap luat ma chua huong tro cap that nghiep. 2. sau khi cham dut huong tro cap that nghiep, thoi gian dong bao hiem that nghiep truoc do cua nguoi lao dong khong duoc tinh de huong tro cap that nghiep cho lan tiep theo. thoi gian dong bao hiem that nghiep cho lan huong bao hiem that nghiep tiep theo duoc tinh lai tu dau, tru truong hop cham dut huong tro cap that nghiep theo quy dinh tai cac diem b, c, h, l, m va n khoan 3 dieu 53 cua luat nay. 3. thoi gian nguoi lao dong dong bao hiem that nghiep khong duoc tinh de huong tro cap mat viec lam hoac tro cap thoi viec theo quy dinh cua phap luat ve lao dong, phap luat ve vien chuc.

1. trong thoi han 03 thang, ke tu ngay cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec, nguoi lao dong nop ho so huong tro cap that nghiep tai trung tam dich vu viec lam do co quan quan ly nha nuoc ve viec lam thanh lap. 2. trong thoi han 20 ngay, ke tu ngay trung tam dich vu viec lam tiep nhan du ho so, co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen ra quyet dinh huong tro cap that nghiep; truong hop khong du dieu kien de huong che do tro cap that nghiep thi phai tra loi bang van ban cho nguoi lao dong. 3. to chuc bao hiem xa hoi thuc hien viec chi tra tro cap that nghiep cho nguoi lao dong trong thoi han 05 ngay, ke tu ngay nhan duoc quyet dinh huong tro cap that nghiep.

1. nguoi su dung lao dong duoc ho tro kinh phi dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 43 cua luat nay dang dong bao hiem that nghiep khi co du cac dieu kien sau day: a) dong du bao hiem that nghiep cho nguoi lao dong thuoc doi tuong tham gia bao hiem that nghiep lien tuc tu du 12 thang tro len tinh den thoi diem de nghi ho tro; b) gap kho khan do suy giam kinh te hoac vi ly do bat kha khang khac buoc phai thay doi co cau hoac cong nghe san xuat, kinh doanh; c) khong du kinh phi de to chuc dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe cho nguoi lao dong; d) co phuong an dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe va duy tri viec lam duoc co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen phe duyet. 2. thoi gian ho tro dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong theo phuong an duoc phe duyet va khong qua 06 thang. 3. chinh phu quy dinh chi tiet dieu nay va muc ho tro kinh phi dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong, bao dam can doi quy bao hiem that nghiep.

1. nguoi su dung lao dong co trach nhiem to chuc dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe va su dung lao dong theo phuong an da duoc phe duyet; su dung nguon kinh phi dung doi tuong, dung muc dich va thuc hien bao cao ket qua to chuc dao tao cho co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen sau khi ket thuc khoa dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe. 2. nguoi lao dong co trach nhiem thuc hien quy dinh cua phap luat ve dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe.

nguoi lao dong quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 43 cua luat nay dang dong bao hiem that nghiep duoc huong tro cap that nghiep khi co du cac dieu kien sau day: 1. cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec, tru cac truong hop sau day: a) nguoi lao dong don phuong cham dut hop dong lao dong, hop dong lam viec trai phap luat; b) huong luong huu, tro cap mat suc lao dong hang thang; 2. da dong bao hiem that nghiep tu du 12 thang tro len trong thoi gian 24 thang truoc khi cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec doi voi truong hop quy dinh tai diem a va diem b khoan 1 dieu 43 cua luat nay; da dong bao hiem that nghiep tu du 12 thang tro len trong thoi gian 36 thang truoc khi cham dut hop dong lao dong doi voi truong hop quy dinh tai diem c khoan 1 dieu 43 cua luat nay; 3. da nop ho so huong tro cap that nghiep tai trung tam dich vu viec lam theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 46 cua luat nay; 4. chua tim duoc viec lam sau 15 ngay, ke tu ngay nop ho so huong bao hiem that nghiep, tru cac truong hop sau day: a) thuc hien nghia vu quan su, nghia vu cong an; b) di hoc tap co thoi han tu du 12 thang tro len; c) chap hanh quyet dinh ap dung bien phap dua vao truong giao duong, co so giao duc bat buoc, co so cai nghien bat buoc; d) bi tam giam; chap hanh hinh phat tu; d) ra nuoc ngoai dinh cu; di lao dong o nuoc ngoai theo hop dong; e) chet.

1. muc huong tro cap that nghiep hang thang bang 60% muc binh quan tien luong thang dong bao hiem that nghiep cua 06 thang lien ke truoc khi that nghiep nhung toi da khong qua 05 lan muc luong co so doi voi nguoi lao dong thuoc doi tuong thuc hien che do tien luong do nha nuoc quy dinh hoac khong qua 05 lan muc luong toi thieu vung theo quy dinh cua bo luat lao dong doi voi nguoi lao dong dong bao hiem that nghiep theo che do tien luong do nguoi su dung lao dong quyet dinh tai thoi diem cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec. 2. thoi gian huong tro cap that nghiep duoc tinh theo so thang dong bao hiem that nghiep, cu dong du 12 thang den du 36 thang thi duoc huong 03 thang tro cap that nghiep, sau do, cu dong du them 12 thang thi duoc huong them 01 thang tro cap that nghiep nhung toi da khong qua 12 thang. 3. thoi diem huong tro cap that nghiep duoc tinh tu ngay thu 16, ke tu ngay nop du ho so huong tro cap that nghiep theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 46 cua luat nay.

1. trong thoi gian huong tro cap that nghiep, hang thang nguoi lao dong phai truc tiep thong bao voi trung tam dich vu viec lam noi dang huong tro cap that nghiep ve viec tim kiem viec lam, tru cac truong hop sau day: a) nguoi lao dong om dau, thai san, tai nan co giay xac nhan cua co so kham benh, chua benh co tham quyen theo quy dinh cua phap luat ve kham benh, chua benh; b) truong hop bat kha khang. 2. doi voi truong hop quy dinh tai diem a va diem b khoan 1 dieu nay thi nguoi lao dong co trach nhiem thong bao cho trung tam dich vu viec lam noi dang huong tro cap that nghiep. 3. bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi huong dan thuc hien dieu nay.1. trong thoi gian huong tro cap that nghiep, hang thang nguoi lao dong phai truc tiep thong bao voi trung tam dich vu viec lam noi dang huong tro cap that nghiep ve viec tim kiem viec lam, tru cac truong hop sau day: a) nguoi lao dong om dau, thai san, tai nan co giay xac nhan cua co so kham benh, chua benh co tham quyen theo quy dinh cua phap luat ve kham benh, chua benh; b) truong hop bat kha khang. 2. doi voi truong hop quy dinh tai diem a va diem b khoan 1 dieu nay thi nguoi lao dong co trach nhiem thong bao cho trung tam dich vu viec lam noi dang huong tro cap that nghiep. 3. bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi huong dan thuc hien dieu nay.

1. nguoi dang huong tro cap that nghiep bi tam dung huong tro cap that nghiep khi khong thong bao ve viec tim kiem viec lam hang thang theo quy dinh tai dieu 52 cua luat nay. 2. nguoi lao dong bi tam dung huong tro cap that nghiep neu van con thoi gian duoc huong theo quyet dinh thi tiep tuc huong tro cap that nghiep khi thuc hien thong bao ve viec tim kiem viec lam hang thang theo quy dinh tai dieu 52 cua luat nay. 3. nguoi dang huong tro cap that nghiep bi cham dut huong tro cap that nghiep trong cac truong hop sau day: a) het thoi han huong tro cap that nghiep; b) tim duoc viec lam; c) thuc hien nghia vu quan su, nghia vu cong an; d) huong luong huu hang thang; d) sau 02 lan tu choi nhan viec lam do trung tam dich vu viec lam noi dang huong tro cap that nghiep gioi thieu ma khong co ly do chinh dang; e) khong thuc hien thong bao tim kiem viec lam hang thang theo quy dinh tai dieu 52 cua luat nay trong 03 thang lien tuc; g) ra nuoc ngoai de dinh cu, di lao dong o nuoc ngoai theo hop dong; h) di hoc tap co thoi han tu du 12 thang tro len; i) bi xu phat vi pham hanh chinh ve hanh vi vi pham phap luat bao hiem that nghiep; k) chet; l) chap hanh quyet dinh ap dung bien phap dua vao truong giao duong, co so giao duc bat buoc, co so cai nghien bat buoc; m) bi toa an tuyen bo mat tich; n) bi tam giam; chap hanh hinh phat tu. 4. nguoi lao dong bi cham dut huong tro cap that nghiep thuoc cac truong hop quy dinh tai cac diem b, c, h, l, m va n khoan 3 dieu nay duoc bao luu thoi gian dong bao hiem that nghiep lam can cu de tinh thoi gian huong tro cap that nghiep cho lan tiep theo khi du dieu kien quy dinh tai dieu 49 cua luat nay. thoi gian bao luu duoc tinh bang tong thoi gian dong bao hiem that nghiep tru di thoi gian dong da huong tro cap that nghiep, theo nguyen tac moi thang da huong tro cap that nghiep tuong ung 12 thang da dong bao hiem that nghiep.

nguoi lao dong quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 43 cua luat nay dang dong bao hiem that nghiep bi cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec ma co nhu cau tim kiem viec lam duoc tu van, gioi thieu viec lam mien phi.

nguoi lao dong quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 43 cua luat nay dang dong bao hiem that nghiep duoc ho tro hoc nghe khi co du cac dieu kien sau day: 1. du cac dieu kien quy dinh tai cac khoan 1, 3 va 4 dieu 49 cua luat nay; 2. da dong bao hiem that nghiep tu du 09 thang tro len trong thoi gian 24 thang truoc khi cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec theo quy dinh cua phap luat.
1. thoi gian ho tro hoc nghe theo thoi gian hoc nghe thuc te nhung khong qua 06 thang. 2. muc ho tro hoc nghe theo quy dinh cua thu tuong chinh phu.

1. muc dong va trach nhiem dong bao hiem that nghiep duoc quy dinh nhu sau: a) nguoi lao dong dong bang 1% tien luong thang; b) nguoi su dung lao dong dong bang 1% quy tien luong thang cua nhung nguoi lao dong dang tham gia bao hiem that nghiep; c) nha nuoc ho tro toi da 1% quy tien luong thang dong bao hiem that nghiep cua nhung nguoi lao dong dang tham gia bao hiem that nghiep va do ngan sach trung uong bao dam. 2. nguon hinh thanh quy bao hiem that nghiep bao gom: a) cac khoan dong va ho tro theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu nay; b) tien sinh loi cua hoat dong dau tu tu quy; c) nguon thu hop phap khac. 3. quy bao hiem that nghiep duoc su dung nhu sau: a) chi tra tro cap that nghiep; b) ho tro dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong; c) ho tro hoc nghe; d) ho tro tu van, gioi thieu viec lam; d) dong bao hiem y te cho nguoi huong tro cap that nghiep; e) chi phi quan ly bao hiem that nghiep thuc hien theo quy dinh cua luat bao hiem xa hoi; g) dau tu de bao toan va tang truong quy.

1. nguoi lao dong thuoc doi tuong thuc hien che do tien luong do nha nuoc quy dinh thi tien luong thang dong bao hiem that nghiep la tien luong lam can cu dong bao hiem xa hoi bat buoc thuc hien theo quy dinh cua luat bao hiem xa hoi. truong hop muc tien luong thang dong bao hiem that nghiep cao hon hai muoi thang luong co so thi muc tien luong thang dong bao hiem that nghiep bang hai muoi thang luong co so tai thoi diem dong bao hiem that nghiep. 2. nguoi lao dong dong bao hiem that nghiep theo che do tien luong do nguoi su dung lao dong quyet dinh thi tien luong thang dong bao hiem that nghiep la tien luong lam can cu dong bao hiem xa hoi bat buoc thuc hien theo quy dinh cua luat bao hiem xa hoi. truong hop muc tien luong thang dong bao hiem that nghiep cao hon hai muoi thang luong toi thieu vung thi muc tien luong thang dong bao hiem that nghiep bang hai muoi thang luong toi thieu vung theo quy dinh cua bo luat lao dong tai thoi diem dong bao hiem that nghiep.

1. quy bao hiem that nghiep duoc hach toan doc lap. to chuc bao hiem xa hoi thuc hien viec thu, chi, quan ly va su dung quy bao hiem that nghiep. 2. hoat dong dau tu tu quy bao hiem that nghiep phai bao dam an toan, minh bach, hieu qua va thu hoi duoc khi can thiet, thong qua cac hinh thuc sau: a) mua trai phieu, tin phieu, cong trai cua nha nuoc; trai phieu cua ngan hang thuong mai do nha nuoc so huu tren 50% von dieu le; b) dau tu vao cac du an quan trong theo quyet dinh cua thu tuong chinh phu; c) cho ngan sach nha nuoc, ngan hang phat trien viet nam, ngan hang chinh sach xa hoi, ngan hang thuong mai do nha nuoc so huu tren 50% von dieu le vay. 3. chinh phu quy dinh chi tiet ty le ho tro tu ngan sach nha nuoc; viec quan ly, su dung quy; to chuc thuc hien bao hiem that nghiep.

nguoi su dung lao dong duoc ho tro kinh phi dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 47 luat viec lam khi co du cac dieu kien sau: 1. dong du bao hiem that nghiep theo quy dinh tai khoan 2 dieu 44 luat viec lam lien tuc tu du 12 thang tro len tinh den thang lien truoc cua thang de nghi ho tro kinh phi dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong hoac den thang cua ngay de nghi ho tro kinh phi de dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong neu nguoi su dung lao dong da dong bao hiem that nghiep cua thang do. 2. gap kho khan do suy giam kinh te hoac vi ly do bat kha khang buoc phai thay doi co cau hoac cong nghe san xuat, kinh doanh va dan den nguy co phai cat giam so lao dong hien co tu 30% hoac tu 50 lao dong tro len doi voi nguoi su dung lao dong co su dung tu 300 lao dong tro xuong va tu 100 lao dong tro len doi voi nguoi su dung lao dong co su dung tren 300 lao dong, khong ke lao dong giao ket hop dong lao dong voi thoi han duoi 03 thang.nhung truong hop duoc coi la bat kha khang neu tren, bao gom: hoa hoan, lu lut, dong dat, song than, dich hoa, dich benh lam thiet hai mot phan hoac toan bo co so vat chat, thiet bi, may moc, nha xuong co xac nhan cua chu tich uy ban nhan dan quan, huyen, thi xa, thanh pho truc thuoc tinh noi nguoi su dung lao dong bi thiet hai. 3. khong du kinh phi de to chuc dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe cho nguoi lao dong duoc xac dinh thong qua bao cao san xuat, kinh doanh cua nam truoc thoi diem de nghi ho tro ma bi lo co xac nhan cua co quan thue. 4. co phuong an dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe va duy tri viec lam duoc co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen phe duyet.

1. muc ho tro kinh phi dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe toi da 01 trieu dong/nguoi/thang. muc ho tro cu the duoc tinh theo thang, thoi gian hoc thuc te cua tung nghe hoac tung khoa hoc nhung khong qua 06 thang.truong hop khoa hoc nghe co nhung ngay le khong du thang thi duoc tinh theo nguyen tac: duoi 15 ngay tinh la 1/2 thang, tu du 15 ngay tro len tinh la 01 thang de xac dinh muc ho tro kinh phi dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong.2. doi voi khoa dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe co muc chi phi cao hon muc ho tro theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu nay thi phan vuot qua muc ho tro do nguoi su dung lao dong tu chi tra.

1. cac khoan dong va ho tro theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 57 luat viec lam. 2. tien sinh loi cua hoat dong dau tu tu quy bao hiem that nghiep. 3. nguon thu hop phap khac, bao gom: a) tien lai cham dong bao hiem that nghiep theo quy dinh; b) cac khoan thu hop phap khac theo quy dinh cua phap luat.

1. hang thang, nguoi su dung lao dong dong bao hiem that nghiep theo muc quy dinh tai diem b khoan 1 dieu 57 luat viec lam va trich tien luong cua tung nguoi lao dong theo muc quy dinh tai diem a khoan 1 dieu 57 luat viec lam de dong cung mot luc vao quy bao hiem that nghiep. 2. nguon dong bao hiem that nghiep theo muc quy dinh tai diem b khoan 1 dieu 57 luat viec lam cua nguoi su dung lao dong nhu sau: a) nguoi su dung lao dong la co quan, don vi, to chuc duoc ngan sach nha nuoc bao dam toan bo kinh phi hoat dong thuong xuyen thi ngan sach nha nuoc bao dam toan bo nguon dong bao hiem that nghiep va duoc bo tri trong du toan chi thuong xuyen hang nam cua co quan, don vi, to chuc theo quy dinh cua phap luat ve phan cap quan ly ngan sach nha nuoc. b) nguoi su dung lao dong la co quan, don vi, to chuc duoc ngan sach nha nuoc bao dam mot phan kinh phi hoat dong thuong xuyen thi ngan sach nha nuoc bao dam nguon dong bao hiem that nghiep cho so nguoi huong luong tu ngan sach nha nuoc va duoc bo tri trong du toan chi thuong xuyen hang nam cua co quan, don vi, to chuc theo quy dinh cua phap luat ve phan cap quan ly ngan sach nha nuoc. phan bao hiem that nghiep phai dong con lai, nguoi su dung lao dong tu bao dam theo quy dinh tai diem c va diem d khoan nay. c) nguoi su dung lao dong la doanh nghiep, don vi, to chuc co hoat dong san xuat, kinh doanh, dich vu thi khoan dong bao hiem that nghiep duoc hach toan vao chi phi san xuat, kinh doanh, dich vu trong ky. d) nguoi su dung lao dong la co quan, don vi, to chuc khac thi khoan dong bao hiem that nghiep duoc su dung tu nguon kinh phi hoat dong cua co quan, don vi, to chuc theo quy dinh cua phap luat.

1. noi dung va muc chi phi quan ly bao hiem that nghiep thuc hien theo quy dinh cua luat bao hiem xa hoi va quy dinh cua phap luat ve quan ly tai chinh doi voi bao hiem xa hoi viet nam. 2. chi phi quan ly bao hiem that nghiep hang nam duoc phan bo va giao du toan nhu sau: a) bao hiem xa hoi viet nam thuc hien cac nhiem vu thu, chi, quan ly va su dung quy bao hiem that nghiep; b) bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi to chuc thuc hien nhiem vu tiep nhan ho so de nghi huong tro cap that nghiep, giai quyet cac che do bao hiem that nghiep va cac nhiem vu lien quan den bao hiem that nghiep; c) bao hiem xa hoi bo quoc phong, bao hiem xa hoi cong an nhan dan thuc hien nhiem vu thu bao hiem that nghiep. 3. phuong thuc chuyen kinh phi chi quan ly bao hiem that nghiep:can cu du toan chi quan ly bao hiem that nghiep duoc thu tuong chinh phu giao, bao hiem xa hoi viet nam thuc hien chuyen kinh phi cho bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi, bao hiem xa hoi bo quoc phong, bao hiem xa hoi cong an nhan dan moi quy mot lan vao truoc ngay 10 cua thang dau trong quy, so tien chuyen moi lan bang muc binh quan mot quy cua du toan duoc giao. truong hop den ngay 10 thang 01 chua duoc cap co tham quyen giao du toan, bao hiem xa hoi viet nam cap tam ung bang muc binh quan mot quy cua du toan duoc giao nam truoc; so kinh phi nay duoc tru vao so kinh phi cap trong nam theo du toan duoc giao.

1. bao hiem xa hoi viet nam co trach nhiem thuc hien cac bien phap bao toan va tang truong quy bao hiem that nghiep tu so tien tam thoi nhan roi. hoat dong dau tu tu quy bao hiem that nghiep phai bao dam an toan, hieu qua va thu hoi duoc khi can thiet. 2. hoi dong quan ly bao hiem xa hoi viet nam quyet dinh viec dau tu theo cac hinh thuc quy dinh tai khoan 2 dieu 59 luat viec lam. 3. tien sinh loi tu dau tu, tang truong quy bao hiem that nghiep hang nam duoc bo sung vao quy bao hiem that nghiep.

1. hang nam, cung thoi gian quy dinh ve lap du toan ngan sach nha nuoc, co quan, to chuc lien quan lap ke hoach thu, chi bao hiem that nghiep va chi phi quan ly bao hiem that nghiep gui bao hiem xa hoi viet nam nhu sau: a) bao hiem xa hoi tinh, thanh pho truc thuoc trung uong lap ke hoach thu, chi bao hiem that nghiep va chi phi quan ly bao hiem that nghiep; b) bao hiem xa hoi bo quoc phong, bao hiem xa hoi cong an nhan dan lap ke hoach thu bao hiem that nghiep va chi phi quan ly bao hiem that nghiep trong bo quoc phong, bo cong an; c) bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi lap ke hoach chi phi quan ly bao hiem that nghiep cho cac don vi thuoc nganh lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi duoc giao thuc hien cac nhiem vu ve bao hiem that nghiep. 2. bao hiem xa hoi viet nam co trach nhiem tong hop du toan thu, chi cac che do bao hiem that nghiep, chi phi quan ly bao hiem that nghiep hang nam, trinh hoi dong quan ly bao hiem xa hoi viet nam thong qua va gui bo tai chinh, bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi.bo tai chinh chu tri, phoi hop voi bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi xem xet, tong hop trinh thu tuong chinh phu quyet dinh giao ke hoach tai chinh hang nam. 3. trong thoi han 15 ngay ke tu ngay nhan duoc quyet dinh giao du toan cua thu tuong chinh phu, bao hiem xa hoi viet nam co trach nhiem thuc hien xong viec giao du toan thu, chi cho cac don vi truc thuoc, bao hiem xa hoi bo quoc phong, bao hiem xa hoi cong an nhan dan va bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi.bo truong bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi phan bo chi phi quan ly bao hiem that nghiep cho cac don vi thuoc nganh lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi duoc giao thuc hien cac nhiem vu ve bao hiem that nghiep. 4. cac don vi duoc giao ke hoach thu, chi tu quy bao hiem that nghiep co trach nhiem quan ly, su dung va lap bao cao quyet toan gui bao hiem xa hoi viet nam tham dinh va tong hop trinh hoi dong quan ly bao hiem xa hoi viet nam thong qua.
1. thoi diem dong bao hiem that nghiep cua nguoi su dung lao dong va nguoi lao dong la thoi diem dong bao hiem xa hoi bat buoc
1. ho so theo doi viec dong, huong bao hiem that nghiep cua nguoi lao dong theo quy dinh tai nghi dinh nay la so bao hiem xa hoi. 2. bao hiem xa hoi viet nam ban hanh mau so bao hiem xa hoi.

1. nguoi lao dong quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 43 luat viec lam dang dong bao hiem that nghiep bi cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec duoc tu van, gioi thieu viec lam mien phi thong qua trung tam dich vu viec lam. 2. kinh phi thuc hien tu van, gioi thieu viec lam cua trung tam dich vu viec lam duoc giao khoan theo so luong nguoi nop ho so de nghi huong tro cap that nghiep cua nam lien truoc va thuc hien thanh quyet toan theo quy dinh tren co so thuc te so luong nguoi nop ho so huong tro cap that nghiep. 3. phi tu van, gioi thieu viec lam thuc hien theo quy dinh cua phap luat ve phi.

1. nguoi lao dong ghi day du cac thong tin vao phieu tu van, gioi thieu viec lam theo mau do bo truong bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi quy dinh va nop truc tiep cho trung tam dich vu viec lam. 2. trung tam dich vu viec lam thuc hien tu van, gioi thieu viec lam tren co so nhu cau, kha nang cua nguoi lao dong va nhu cau cua thi truong lao dong. 3. trung tam dich vu viec lam bo tri nhan su va co so vat chat de to chuc thuc hien tu van, gioi thieu viec lam.

1. de nghi huong tro cap that nghiep theo mau do bo truong bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi quy dinh. 2. ban chinh hoac ban sao co chung thuc cua mot trong cac giay to sau day xac nhan ve viec cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec: a) hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec da het han hoac da hoan thanh cong viec theo hop dong lao dong; b) quyet dinh thoi viec; c) quyet dinh sa thai; d) quyet dinh ky luat buoc thoi viec; d) thong bao hoac thoa thuan cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec.truong hop nguoi lao dong tham gia bao hiem that nghiep theo quy dinh tai diem c khoan 1 dieu 43 luat viec lam thi giay to xac nhan ve viec cham dut hop dong lao dong theo mua vu hoac theo mot cong viec nhat dinh co thoi han tu du 03 thang den duoi 12 thang la ban chinh hoac ban sao co chung thuc cua hop dong do. 3. so bao hiem xa hoi.to chuc bao hiem xa hoi thuc hien xac nhan ve viec dong bao hiem that nghiep va tra so bao hiem xa hoi cho nguoi lao dong trong thoi han 05 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay nhan duoc de nghi cua nguoi su dung lao dong.doi voi nguoi su dung lao dong la cac co quan, don vi, doanh nghiep thuoc bo quoc phong, bo cong an thi trong thoi han 30 ngay, bao hiem xa hoi bo quoc phong, bao hiem xa hoi cong an nhan dan thuc hien xac nhan ve viec dong bao hiem that nghiep va tra so bao hiem xa hoi cho nguoi lao dong ke tu ngay nhan duoc de nghi cua nguoi su dung lao dong.

1. trong thoi han 03 thang ke tu ngay cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec, nguoi lao dong chua co viec lam va co nhu cau huong tro cap that nghiep phai truc tiep nop 01 bo ho so de nghi huong tro cap that nghiep theo dung quy dinh tai dieu 16 cua nghi dinh nay cho trung tam dich vu viec lam tai dia phuong noi nguoi lao dong muon nhan tro cap that nghiep. 2. nguoi lao dong duoc uy quyen cho nguoi khac nop ho so hoac gui ho so theo duong buu dien neu thuoc mot trong cac truong hop sau: a) om dau, thai san co xac nhan cua co so y te co tham quyen; b) bi tai nan co xac nhan cua canh sat giao thong hoac co so y te co tham quyen; c) hoa hoan, lu lut, dong dat, song than, dich hoa, dich benh co xac nhan cua chu tich uy ban nhan dan xa, phuong, thi tran.ngay nop ho so de nghi huong tro cap that nghiep trong cac truong hop neu tren la ngay nguoi duoc uy quyen truc tiep nop ho so hoac ngay ghi tren dau buu dien doi voi truong hop gui theo duong buu dien. 3. trung tam dich vu viec lam co trach nhiem tiep nhan, kiem tra ho so, ghi phieu hen tra ket qua theo mau do bo truong bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi quy dinh va trao phieu truc tiep cho nguoi nop ho so hoac gui qua duong buu dien doi voi nguoi nop ho so qua duong buu dien; truong hop ho so khong dung theo quy dinh tai dieu 16 nghi dinh nay thi tra lai nguoi nop va neu ro ly do.

1. trung tam dich vu viec lam co trach nhiem xem xet, trinh giam doc so lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi quyet dinh ve viec huong tro cap that nghiep cua nguoi lao dong trong thoi han 20 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay nhan du ho so theo quy dinh, truong hop ho so de nghi huong tro cap that nghiep gui theo duong buu dien thi ngay nhan ho so duoc tinh la ngay chuyen den ghi tren dau buu dien.nguoi lao dong chua tim duoc viec lam trong thoi han 15 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay nop ho so de nghi huong tro cap that nghiep duoc giam doc so lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi quyet dinh huong tro cap that nghiep thi trung tam dich vu viec lam xac nhan ve viec da giai quyet huong tro cap that nghiep cua nguoi lao dong vao so bao hiem xa hoi va gui lai nguoi lao dong cung voi quyet dinh huong tro cap that nghiep sau khi chup so bao hiem xa hoi de luu ho so.thoi diem huong tro cap that nghiep cua nguoi lao dong duoc tinh tu ngay thu 16 theo ngay lam viec ke tu ngay nop ho so de nghi huong tro cap that nghiep.quyet dinh ve viec huong tro cap that nghiep duoc trung tam dich vu viec lam gui: 01 ban den bao hiem xa hoi tinh, thanh pho truc thuoc trung uong (sau day viet tat la bao hiem xa hoi cap tinh) de thuc hien chi tra tro cap that nghiep va cap the bao hiem y te cho nguoi lao dong; 01 ban den nguoi lao dong duoc huong tro cap that nghiep. quyet dinh ve viec huong tro cap that nghiep thuc hien theo mau do bo truong bo lao dong - 1. nguoi lao dong dang huong tro cap that nghiep phai thuc hien thong bao ve viec tim kiem viec lam theo quy dinh tai dieu 52 luat viec lam. 2. trong thoi han 02 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay nguoi lao dong khong den thong bao ve viec tim kiem viec lam hang thang theo quy dinh, trung tam dich vu viec lam noi nguoi lao dong dang huong tro cap that nghiep trinh giam doc so lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi quyet dinh ve viec tam dung huong tro cap that nghiep cua nguoi lao dong.quyet dinh ve viec tam dung huong tro cap that nghiep duoc trung tam dich vu viec lam gui: 01 ban den bao hiem xa hoi cap tinh de thuc hien tam dung chi tra tro cap that nghiep doi voi nguoi lao dong; 01 ban den nguoi lao dong. quyet dinh ve viec tam dung huong tro cap that nghiep thuc hien theo mau do bo truong bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi quy dinh.

ngu. d) huong luong huu hang thangngay ma nguoi lao dong duoc xac dinh nghi huu la ngay dau tien tinh huong luong huu duoc ghi trong quyet dinh huong luong huu hang thang cua co quan co tham quyen. d) hoc duoc ghi trong giay bao nhap hoc doi voi hoc tap trong nuoc. truong hop hoc tap o nuoc ngoai thi ngay nguoi lao dong duoc xac dinh di hoc tap co thoi han 12 thang tro len la ngay xuat canh theo quy dinh cua phap luat ve xuat, nhap canh. i) bi xu phat vi pham hanh chinh ve hanh vi vi pham phap luat bao hiem that nghiepngay ma nguoi lao dong duoc xac dinh bi xu phat vi pham hanh chinh neu tren la ngay nguoi lao dong bi xu phat theo quyet dinh cua co quan co tham quyen. k) chetngay xac dinh nguoi lao dong chet la ngay ghi trong giay chung tu. l) chap hanh quyet dinh ap dung bien phap dua vao b) giay gioi thieu chuyen noi huong tro cap that nghiep; c) ban chup quyet dinh huong tro cap that nghiep; d) ban chup cac quyet dinh ho tro hoc nghe, quyet dinh tam dung huong tro cap that nghiep, quyet dinh tiep tuc huong tro cap that nghiep (neu co); d) ban chup thong bao ve viec tim kiem viec lam hang thang (neu co), cac giay to khac co trong ho so huong tro cap that nghiep. 3. khi nhan duoc ho so chuyen noi huong tro cap that nghiep, nguoi lao dong tra lai the bao hiem y te cho to chuc bao hiem xa hoi noi dang chi tra tro cap that nghiep cho nguoi lao dong. 4. trong thoi han 02 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay cung cap ho so chuyen noi huong tro cap that nghiep cho nguoi lao dong theo quy dinh tai khoan 2 dieu nay, trung tam dich vu viec lam noi nguoi lao dong chuyen di gui thong bao ve viec chuyen noi huong tro cap that nghiep cho bao hiem xa hoi cap tinh de dung viec chi tra tro cap that nghiep theo mau do bo truong bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi quy dinh. 5. trong thoi han 10 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay nguoi lao dong nhan duoc ho so chuyen noi huong tro cap that nghiep, nguoi lao dong phai nop ho so chuyen noi huong tro cap that nghiep cho trung tam dich vu viec lam noi chuyen den tru cac truong hop quy dinh tai khoan 6 dieu nay.ke tu ngay nguoi lao dong nhan duoc ho so chuyen noi huong tro cap that nghiep thi nguoi lao dong thuc hien cac quyen va trach nhiem trong thoi gian dang huong tro cap that nghiep theo quy dinh cua phap luat. 6. nguoi lao dong nop ho so chuyen noi huong tro cap that nghiep qua thoi han theo quy dinh tai khoan 5 dieu nay nhung nhieu nhat khong qua 07 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay het han chuyen noi huong tro cap that nghiep neu thuoc mot trong cac truong hop sau: a) om dau, thai san co xac nhan cua co so y te co tham quyen; b) bi tai nan co xac nhan cua canh sat giao thong hoac co so y te co tham quyen; c) hoa hoan, lu lut, dong dat, song than, dich hoa, dich benh co xac nhan cua chu tich uy ban nhan dan xa, phuong, thi tran. 7. trong thoi han 03 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay nhan duoc ho so chuyen noi huong tro cap that nghiep do nguoi lao dong chuyen den, trung tam dich vu viec lam gui van ban de nghi bao hiem xa hoi cap tinh noi chuyen den de tiep tuc thuc hien viec chi tra tro cap that nghiep va cap the bao hiem y te cho nguoi lao dong kem theo ban chup quyet dinh huong tro cap that nghiep cua nguoi lao dong. van ban de nghi bao hiem xa hoi cap tinh theo mau do bo truong bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi quy dinh. 8. to chuc bao hiem xa hoi noi nguoi lao dong chuyen den huong tro cap that nghiep thuc hien chi tra tro cap that nghiep va cap the bao hiem y te cho nguoi lao dong theo quy dinh cua phap luat.

1. cap the bao hiem y te can cu quyet dinh huong tro cap that nghiep, to chuc bao hiem xa hoi cap the bao hiem y te cho nguoi lao dong. 2. thu hoi the bao hiem y tenguoi lao dong dang huong tro cap that nghiep hang thang bi cham dut huong tro cap that nghiep thi nguoi lao dong khong duoc huong bao hiem y te va phai tra lai the bao hiem y te cho to chuc bao hiem xa hoi theo huong dan cua bao hiem xa hoi viet nam.

1. ho so de nghi ho tro hoc nghe doi voi nguoi dang huong tro cap that nghiep: de nghi ho tro hoc nghe theo mau do bo truong bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi quy dinh. 2. ho so de nghi ho tro hoc nghe doi voi nguoi that nghiep co thoi gian dong bao hiem that nghiep tu du 09 thang tro len nhung khong thuoc dien huong tro cap that nghiep: a) de nghi ho tro hoc nghe theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu nay; b) ban chinh hoac ban sao co chung thuc cua mot trong cac giay to theo quy dinh tai khoan 2 dieu 16 nghi dinh nay; c) so bao hiem xa hoi.

1. nguoi lao dong dap ung du dieu kien theo quy dinh tai dieu 55 luat viec lam co nhu cau hoc nghe duoc ho tro 01 lan de hoc 01 nghe tai co so dao tao theo quy dinh cua phap luat ve day nghe (sau day duoc viet tat la co so day nghe). phuong thuc ho tro kinh phi hoc nghe duoc thuc hien thong qua co so day nghe. 2. nguoi lao dong co nhu cau hoc nghe thi phai nop 01 bo ho so de nghi ho tro hoc nghe cho trung tam dich vu viec lam.a) ho so de nghi ho tro hoc nghe theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 24 nghi dinh nay nop cho trung tam dich vu viec lam noi nguoi lao dong dang huong tro cap that nghiep;b) ho so de nghi ho tro hoc nghe theo quy dinh tai khoan 2 dieu 24 nghi dinh nay nop cho trung tam dich vu viec lam dia phuong noi nguoi lao dong co nhu cau hoc nghe. 3. trung tam dich vu viec lam co trach nhiem xem xet ho so de nghi ho tro hoc nghe va trao cho nguoi lao dong phieu hen tra ket qua theo mau do bo truong bo lao dong – thuong binh va xa hoi quy dinh. 4. trong thoi han 15 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay nhan du ho so de nghi ho tro hoc nghe, trung tam dich vu viec lam co trach nhiem xem xet, trinh giam doc so lao dong – thuong binh va xa hoi quyet dinh ve viec ho tro hoc nghe cho nguoi lao dong.quyet dinh ve viec ho tro hoc nghe duoc trung tam dich vu viec lam gui: 01 ban den bao hiem xa hoi cap tinh de thuc hien chi tra cho co so day nghe; 01 ban den co so day nghe de thuc hien viec day nghe cho nguoi lao dong; 01 ban den nguoi lao dong. quyet dinh ve viec ho tro hoc nghe thuc hien theo mau do bo truong bo lao dong – thuong binh va xa hoi quy dinh. truong hop nguoi lao dong khong duoc ho tro hoc nghe thi trung tam dich vu viec lam phai tra loi bang van ban va neu ro ly do.doi voi nguoi that nghiep quy dinh tai khoan 2 dieu 24 nghi dinh nay khi duoc giai quyet ho tro hoc nghe thi trung tam dich vu viec lam xac nhan da giai quyet ho tro hoc nghe vao so bao hiem xa hoi va chup 01 ban de luu ho so.truong hop nguoi lao dong da huong het thoi gian duoc huong tro cap that nghiep theo quy dinh ma van tiep tuc hoc nghe hoac chuan bi tham gia hoc nghe theo quyet dinh cua giam doc so lao dong – thuong binh va xa hoi thi van duoc ho tro hoc nghe cho den het thoi gian hoc nghe. 5. co so day nghe to chuc day nghe cho nguoi lao dong theo quyet dinh cua giam doc so lao dong – thuong binh va xa hoi va co trach nhiem lap danh sach co chu ky cua nguoi lao dong dang hoc nghe chuyen cho to chuc bao hiem xa hoi de thanh quyet toan kinh phi ho tro hoc nghe theo quy dinh.

1. van ban de nghi ho tro kinh phi dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong bao gom cac noi dung co ban sau: nganh, nghe hoac linh vuc san xuat, kinh doanh; tinh hinh san xuat, kinh doanh; so lao dong tai thoi diem de nghi ho tro; nhung kho khan, nguyen nhan buoc phai thay doi co cau hoac cong nghe san xuat, kinh doanh; nguy co phai cat giam so lao dong; nhu cau kinh phi de to chuc dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe cho nguoi lao dong; cam ket to chuc dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe va su dung lao dong theo dung phuong an da duoc phe duyet.2. phuong an thay doi co cau hoac cong nghe san xuat, kinh doanh duoc cap co tham quyen phe duyet.3. phuong an dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe va duy tri viec lam theo quy dinh tai khoan 4 dieu 3 nghi dinh nay.4. giay to chung minh khong du kinh phi de to chuc dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe cho nguoi lao dong theo quy dinh tai khoan 3 dieu 3 nghi dinh nay.5. van ban xac nhan cua to chuc bao hiem xa hoi noi nguoi su dung lao dong dong bao hiem that nghiep cho nguoi lao dong theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 3 nghi dinh nay.bo truong bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi huong dan khoan 1 va khoan 3 dieu nay.

1. nguoi su dung lao dong co nhu cau ho tro dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe cho nguoi lao dong phai nop ho so theo quy dinh tai dieu 26 nghi dinh nay cho so lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi noi dong tru so chinh cua don vi de tham dinh. 2. trong thoi han 30 ngay ke tu ngay nhan du ho so cua nguoi su dung lao dong theo quy dinh, so lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi tham dinh va phe duyet phuong an dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe va duy tri viec lam; chu tri, phoi hop voi so tai chinh va cac co quan, don vi co lien quan tham dinh ho so de nghi ho tro dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe theo quy dinh tai dieu 3 nghi dinh nay va trinh chu tich uy ban nhan dan tinh, thanh pho truc thuoc trung uong (sau day duoc viet tat la chu tich uy ban nhan dan cap tinh) xem xet, quyet dinh viec ho tro kinh phi dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong.truong hop khong ho tro thi so lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi phai tra loi bang van ban va neu ro ly do cho nguoi su dung lao dong.quyet dinh ve viec ho tro kinh phi dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong duoc so lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi gui: + 01 ban den bao hiem xa hoi cap tinh de thuc hien chi tra kinh phi ho tro; 01 ban den bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi de bao cao; + 01 ban den trung tam dich vu viec lam; + 01 ban den nguoi su dung lao dong de thuc hien va 01 ban den co so day nghe cho nguoi lao dong trong truong hop viec dao tao khong do nguoi su dung lao dong truc tiep thuc hien. quyet dinh ve viec ho tro kinh phi dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong thuc hien theo mau do bo truong bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi quy dinh. 3. to chuc bao hiem xa hoi thuc hien tam ung 50% kinh phi ho tro dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe cho nguoi su dung lao dong theo quyet dinh cua chu tich uy ban nhan dan cap tinh trong thoi han 05 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay nhan duoc quyet dinh cua chu tich uy ban nhan dan cap tinh va thuc hien viec thanh quyet toan theo quy dinh tren co so thuc te cua viec thuc hien phuong an dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe.

1. nguoi su dung lao dong to chuc dao tao hoac phoi hop voi co so day nghe, trung tam dich vu viec lam de to chuc dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe cua nguoi lao dong theo quyet dinh ho tro cua chu tich uy ban nhan dan cap tinh va dam bao duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong. 2. nguoi su dung lao dong co trach nhiem thuc hien hoac phoi hop voi co so day nghe thuc hien viec dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe va dam bao duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong theo phuong an da duoc phe duyet. 3. so lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi theo doi, giam sat viec to chuc thuc hien ho tro dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe theo quyet dinh ho tro cua chu tich uy ban nhan dan cap tinh.

1. nhan so bao hiem xa hoi co xac nhan day du ve viec dong bao hiem that nghiep khi cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec. 2. duoc huong cac che do bao hiem that nghiep theo quy dinh tai dieu 42 luat viec lam. 3. duoc uy quyen cho nguoi khac nop ho so huong tro cap that nghiep theo quy dinh tai khoan 2 dieu 17, nhan quyet dinh huong tro cap that nghiep theo quy dinh tai khoan 3 dieu 18 nghi dinh nay. 4. yeu cau nguoi su dung lao dong cung cap thong tin ve viec dong bao hiem that nghiep; yeu cau trung tam dich vu viec lam, to chuc bao hiem xa hoi cung cap thong tin lien quan den bao hiem that nghiep. 5. khieu nai, to cao ve bao hiem that nghiep theo quy dinh cua phap luat. 6. cac quyen khac theo quy dinh cua phap luat.

1. dong bao hiem that nghiep du va dung theo quy dinh tai diem a khoan 1 dieu 57 luat viec lam. 2. thuc hien dung quy dinh ve viec tham gia bao hiem that nghiep. 3. bao quan, su dung so bao hiem xa hoi, the bao hiem y te theo quy dinh. 4. nguoi lao dong giao ket nhieu hop dong lao dong khi cham dut hop dong lao dong dang tham gia bao hiem that nghiep phai thong bao voi nguoi su dung lao dong ke tiep de tiep tuc tham gia bao hiem that nghiep theo quy dinh. 5. nop ho so de nghi huong tro cap that nghiep, ho tro hoc nghe theo quy dinh tai trung tam dich vu viec lam khi co nhu cau. 6. hang thang thong bao voi trung tam dich vu viec lam ve viec tim kiem viec lam trong thoi gian dang huong tro cap that nghiep theo quy dinh. 7. nhan viec lam hoac tham gia khoa hoc nghe phu hop khi duoc trung tam dich vu viec lam gioi thieu trong thoi gian huong tro cap that nghiep. 8. trong thoi han 15 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay nop ho so de nghi huong tro cap that nghiep neu nguoi lao dong tim duoc viec lam thi phai thong bao ngay cho trung tam dich vu viec lam noi nop ho so de nghi huong tro cap that nghiep. 9. nhan thong bao ve viec khong duoc huong tro cap that nghiep hoac khong duoc ho tro hoc nghe, quyet dinh ve viec huong tro cap that nghiep, quyet dinh ve viec huy quyet dinh huong tro cap that nghiep, quyet dinh ve viec ho tro hoc nghe, quyet dinh ve viec tam dung huong tro cap that nghiep, quyet dinh ve viec tiep tuc huong tro cap that nghiep, quyet dinh ve viec cham dut huong tro cap that nghiep, quyet dinh ve viec bao luu thoi gian dong bao hiem that nghiep theo quy dinh. 10. thong bao theo quy dinh voi trung tam dich vu viec lam khi thuoc cac truong hop cham dut huong tro cap that nghiep theo quy dinh tai cac diem b, c, d, g, h, l va n khoan 1 dieu 21 nghi dinh nay. 11. nop lai the bao hiem y te cho to chuc bao hiem xa hoi khi thuoc cac truong hop cham dut huong tro cap that nghiep theo quy dinh tai cac diem b, c, d, d, e, g, h, i, l va n khoan 1 dieu 21 nghi dinh nay va trong truong hop chuyen noi huong tro cap that nghiep theo quy dinh tai dieu 22 nghi dinh nay. 12. thuc hien day du cac quy dinh cua phap luat ve bao hiem that nghiep va cac quy dinh khac cua phap luat co lien quan.

1. duoc ho tro kinh phi dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong theo quy dinh. 2. tu choi thuc hien cac yeu cau khong dung quy dinh cua phap luat ve bao hiem that nghiep. 3. khieu nai, to cao ve bao hiem that nghiep theo quy dinh cua phap luat. 4. cac quyen khac theo quy dinh cua phap luat.

1. chu tri, phoi hop voi to chuc cong doan co so de thong tin, tuyen truyen, pho bien chinh sach, phap luat ve bao hiem that nghiep. 2. xac dinh doi tuong tham gia bao hiem that nghiep, thuc hien trinh tu, thu tuc tham gia bao hiem that nghiep, dong bao hiem that nghiep dung, du va kip thoi theo quy dinh cua phap luat. 3. bao quan ho so tham gia bao hiem that nghiep cua nguoi lao dong trong thoi gian nguoi lao dong lam viec tai don vi. xuat trinh cac tai lieu, ho so va cung cap thong tin lien quan theo yeu cau cua co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen khi co kiem tra, thanh tra ve bao hiem that nghiep. 4. cung cap thong tin ve viec dong bao hiem that nghiep trong thoi han 02 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay nguoi lao dong yeu cau. 5. cung cap ban sao hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec hoac xac nhan ve viec don phuong cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec cho nguoi lao dong cham nhat trong thoi han 02 ngay lam viec ke tu ngay nguoi lao dong cham dut hop dong lao dong hoac hop dong lam viec. thuc hien thu tuc xac nhan ve viec dong bao hiem that nghiep cho nguoi lao dong de nguoi lao dong hoan thien ho so huong bao hiem that nghiep theo quy dinh. 6. thong bao voi trung tam dich vu viec lam noi dat tru so lam viec cua nguoi su dung lao dong khi co bien dong lao dong lam viec tai don vi theo huong dan cua bo truong bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi. doi voi cac don vi thuoc luc luong vu trang, bo truong bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi chu tri, phoi hop voi bo truong bo quoc phong va bo truong bo cong an huong dan thuc hien. 7. truoc ngay 15 thang 01 hang nam bao cao so lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi ve tinh hinh tham gia bao hiem that nghiep cua nam truoc. 8. to chuc trien khai viec dao tao, boi duong, nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe de duy tri viec lam cho nguoi lao dong theo dung phuong an duoc co quan co tham quyen phe duyet. 9. su dung nguoi lao dong da duoc dao tao, boi duong nang cao trinh do ky nang nghe theo phuong an da duoc phe duyet va bao cao ket qua thuc hien ve so lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi trong thoi han 30 ngay ke tu ngay ket thuc khoa dao tao. 10. thuc hien cac trach nhiem khac theo quy dinh cua phap luat.

1. tu choi yeu cau huong cac che do bao hiem that nghiep khong dung quy dinh cua phap luat. 2. kien nghi voi co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen xay dung, sua doi, bo sung che do, chinh sach phap luat ve bao hiem that nghiep va quan ly quy bao hiem that nghiep. 3. kien nghi voi co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen xu ly vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem that nghiep. 4. cac quyen khac theo quy dinh cua phap luat.

1. to chuc thong tin, tuyen truyen, pho bien chinh sach, phap luat ve bao hiem that nghiep. 2. to chuc tiep nhan ho so de nghi huong tro cap that nghiep va ho so de nghi ho tro hoc nghe, xem xet va thuc hien cac thu tuc giai quyet huong tro cap that nghiep, ho tro hoc nghe theo quy dinh cua phap luat. 3. to chuc tu van, gioi thieu viec lam va day nghe cho nguoi lao dong theo quy dinh cua phap luat. 4. kiem tra, theo doi, cap nhat cac thong tin cua nguoi lao dong lien quan den viec huong cac che do bao hiem that nghiep. 5. thuc hien che do bao cao dinh ky hang thang, quy, nam va bao cao dot xuat voi bo lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi va so lao dong - thuong binh va xa hoi ve bao hiem that nghiep theo quy dinh cua phap luat. 6. cung cap tai lieu, thong tin lien quan ve bao hiem that nghiep theo yeu cau cua nguoi lao dong, to chuc cong doan va co quan co tham quyen theo quy dinh cua phap luat. 7. luu tru, bao quan ho so huong bao hiem that nghiep theo quy dinh cua phap luat. 8. to chuc dao tao, boi duong chuyen mon nghiep vu va ung dung cong nghe thong tin trong quan ly bao hiem that nghiep va giai quyet huong cac che do bao hiem that nghiep cho nguoi lao dong theo quy dinh. 9. tham gia thuc hien hop tac quoc te ve bao hiem that nghiep.10. thuc hien trach nhiem khac theo quy dinh cua phap luat.

bao hiem y te la hinh thuc bao hiem duoc ap dung trong linh vuc cham soc suc khoe, khong vi muc dich loi nhuan, do nha nuoc to chuc thuc hien va cac doi tuong co trach nhiem tham gia theo quy dinh cua luat nay.
bao hiem y te toan dan la viec cac doi tuong quy dinh trong luat nay deu tham gia bao hiem y te.

quy bao hiem y te la quy tai chinh duoc hinh thanh tu nguon dong bao hiem y te va cac nguon thu hop phap khac, duoc su dung de chi tra chi phi kham benh, chua benh cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te, chi phi quan ly bo may cua to chuc bao hiem y te va nhung khoan chi phi hop phap khac lien quan den bao hiem y te.

nguoi su dung lao dong bao gom co quan nha nuoc, don vi su nghiep cong lap, don vi vu trang nhan dan, to chuc chinh tri, to chuc chinh tri - xa hoi, to chuc chinh tri xa hoi - nghe nghiep, to chuc xa hoi, to chuc xa hoi - nghe nghiep, doanh nghiep, hop tac xa, ho kinh doanh ca the va to chuc khac; to chuc nuoc ngoai, to chuc quoc te hoat dong tren lanh tho viet nam co trach nhiem dong bao hiem y te.
co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te ban dau la co so kham benh, chua benh dau tien theo dang ky cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te va duoc ghi trong the bao hiem y te.

giam dinh bao hiem y te la hoat dong chuyen mon do to chuc bao hiem y te tien hanh nham danh gia su hop ly cua viec cung cap dich vu y te cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te, lam co so de thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te.

1. bao dam chia se rui ro giua nhung nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te. 2. muc dong bao hiem y te duoc xac dinh theo ty le phan tram cua tien luong, tien cong, tien luong huu, tien tro cap hoac muc luong toi thieu cua khu vuc hanh chinh (sau day goi chung la muc luong toi thieu). 3. muc huong bao hiem y te theo muc do benh tat, nhom doi tuong trong pham vi quyen loi cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te. 4. chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te do quy bao hiem y te va nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te cung chi tra. 5. quy bao hiem y te duoc quan ly tap trung, thong nhat, cong khai, minh bach, bao dam can doi thu, chi va duoc nha nuoc bao ho

1. chi phi trong truong hop quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 21 da duoc ngan sach nha nuoc chi tra. 2. dieu duong, an duong tai co so dieu duong, an duong. 3. kham suc khoe. 4. xet nghiem, chan doan thai khong nham muc dich dieu tri. 5. su dung ky thuat ho tro sinh san, dich vu ke hoach hoa gia dinh, nao hut thai, pha thai, tru truong hop phai dinh chi thai nghen do nguyen nhan benh ly cua thai nhi hay cua san phu. 6. su dung dich vu tham my. 7. dieu tri lac, can thi va tat khuc xa cua mat. 8. su dung vat tu y te thay the bao gom chan tay gia, mat gia, rang gia, kinh mat, may tro thinh, phuong tien tro giup van dong trong kham benh, chua benh va phuc hoi chuc nang. 9. kham benh, chua benh, phuc hoi chuc nang doi voi benh nghe nghiep, tai nan lao dong, tham hoa. 10. kham benh, chua benh trong truong hop tu tu, tu gay thuong tich. 11. kham benh, chua benh nghien ma tuy, nghien ruou hoac chat gay nghien khac. 12. kham benh, chua benh ton thuong ve the chat, tinh than do hanh vi vi pham phap luat cua nguoi do gay ra. 13. giam dinh y khoa, giam dinh phap y, giam dinh phap y tam than. 14. tham gia thu nghiem lam sang, nghien cuu khoa hoc.

1. co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te la co so y te co ky hop dong kham benh, chua benh voi to chuc bao hiem y te. 2. co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te bao gom: a) tram y te xa va tuong duong, nha ho sinh; b) phong kham da khoa, chuyen khoa; c) benh vien da khoa, chuyen khoa.

1. hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te la van ban thoa thuan giua to chuc bao hiem y te voi co so kham benh, chua benh ve viec cung ung dich vu va thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te. 2. hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te gom cac noi dung chu yeu sau day: a) doi tuong phuc vu va yeu cau ve chat luong cung ung dich vu; b) phuong thuc thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh; c) quyen va trach nhiem cua cac ben; d) thoi han hop dong; d) trach nhiem do vi pham hop dong; e) dieu kien thay doi, thanh ly, cham dut hop dong. 3. viec thoa thuan ve dieu kien thay doi, thanh ly, cham dut hop dong quy dinh tai diem e khoan 2 dieu nay phai bao dam khong lam gian doan viec kham benh, chua benh cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te. 4. bo truong bo y te quy dinh mau hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te.

1. nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te co quyen dang ky kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te ban dau tai co so kham benh, chua benh tuyen xa, tuyen huyen hoac tuong duong; tru truong hop duoc dang ky tai co so kham benh, chua benh tuyen tinh hoac tuyen trung uong theo quy dinh cua bo truong bo y te. truong hop nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te phai lam viec luu dong hoac den tam tru tai dia phuong khac thi duoc kham benh, chua benh ban dau tai co so kham benh, chua benh phu hop voi tuyen chuyen mon ky thuat va noi nguoi do dang lam viec luu dong, tam tru theo quy dinh cua bo truong bo y te. 2. nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te duoc thay doi co so dang ky kham benh, chua benh ban dau vao dau moi quy. 3. ten co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te ban dau duoc ghi trong the bao hiem y te.

truong hop vuot qua kha nang chuyen mon ky thuat thi co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te co trach nhiem chuyen nguoi benh kip thoi den co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te khac theo quy dinh ve chuyen tuyen chuyen mon ky thuat.

1. nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te khi den kham benh, chua benh phai xuat trinh the bao hiem y te co anh; truong hop the bao hiem y te chua co anh thi phai xuat trinh the bao hiem y te cung voi giay to chung minh ve nhan than cua nguoi do; doi voi tre em duoi 6 tuoi chi phai xuat trinh the bao hiem y te. 2. truong hop cap cuu, nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te duoc kham benh, chua benh tai bat ky co so kham benh, chua benh nao va phai xuat trinh the bao hiem y te cung voi giay to quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu nay truoc khi ra vien. 3. truong hop chuyen tuyen dieu tri, nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te phai co ho so chuyen vien cua co so kham benh, chua benh. 4. truong hop kham lai theo yeu cau dieu tri, nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te phai co giay hen kham lai cua co so kham benh, chua benh.

1. noi dung giam dinh bao hiem y te bao gom: a) kiem tra thu tuc kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te; b) kiem tra, danh gia viec chi dinh dieu tri, su dung thuoc, hoa chat, vat tu, thiet bi y te, dich vu ky thuat y te cho nguoi benh; c) kiem tra, xac dinh chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te. 2. viec giam dinh bao hiem y te phai bao dam chinh xac, cong khai, minh bach. 3. to chuc bao hiem y te thuc hien viec giam dinh bao hiem y te va chiu trach nhiem truoc phap luat ve ket qua giam dinh.

1. viec thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te duoc thuc hien theo cac phuong thuc sau day: a) thanh toan theo dinh suat la thanh toan theo dinh muc chi phi kham benh, chua benh va muc dong tinh tren moi the bao hiem y te duoc dang ky tai co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te trong mot khoang thoi gian nhat dinh; b) thanh toan theo gia dich vu la thanh toan dua tren chi phi cua thuoc, hoa chat, vat tu, thiet bi y te, dich vu ky thuat y te duoc su dung cho nguoi benh; c) thanh toan theo truong hop benh la thanh toan theo chi phi kham benh, chua benh duoc xac dinh truoc cho tung truong hop theo chan doan. 2. chinh phu quy dinh cu the viec ap dung phuong thuc thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu nay .

1. to chuc bao hiem y te thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te voi co so kham benh, chua benh theo hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te. 2. to chuc bao hiem y te thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te truc tiep cho nguoi co the bao hiem y te di kham benh, chua benh trong cac truong hop sau day: a) tai co so kham benh, chua benh khong co hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te; b) truong hop kham benh, chua benh khong dung quy dinh tai cac dieu 26, 27 va 28 cua luat nay; c) tai nuoc ngoai; d) mot so truong hop dac biet khac do bo truong bo y te quy dinh. 3. bo y te chu tri, phoi hop voi bo tai chinh quy dinh thu tuc, muc thanh toan doi voi cac truong hop quy dinh tai khoan 2 dieu nay. 4. to chuc bao hiem y te thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh tren co so vien phi theo quy dinh cua chinh phu.

1. to chuc bao hiem y te co trach nhiem tam ung kinh phi hang quy cho co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te toi thieu bang 80% chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te thuc te cua quy truoc da duoc quyet toan. doi voi co so kham benh, chua benh lan dau ky hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te thi muc tam ung lan dau toi thieu bang 80% muc kinh phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te cua mot quy theo hop dong da ky. 2. viec thanh toan, quyet toan giua co so kham benh, chua benh va to chuc bao hiem y te duoc thuc hien hang quy nhu sau: a) trong thang dau cua moi quy, co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te co trach nhiem gui bao cao quyet toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te cua quy truoc cho to chuc bao hiem y te; b) trong thoi han 30 ngay, ke tu ngay nhan duoc bao cao quyet toan cua co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te, to chuc bao hiem y te co trach nhiem xem xet va thong bao ket qua quyet toan chi phi. trong thoi han 15 ngay, ke tu ngay thong bao ket qua quyet toan, to chuc bao hiem y te phai hoan thanh viec thanh toan voi co so kham benh, chua benh. 3. trong thoi han 40 ngay, ke tu ngay nhan du ho so de nghi thanh toan cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te kham benh, chua benh theo quy dinh tai diem a va diem b khoan 2 dieu 31 cua luat nay; trong thoi han 60 ngay, ke tu ngay nhan du ho so de nghi thanh toan cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te kham benh, chua benh theo quy dinh tai diem c va diem d khoan 2 dieu 31 cua luat nay, to chuc bao hiem y te phai thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh truc tiep cho cac doi tuong nay.

1. tien dong bao hiem y te theo quy dinh cua luat nay. 2. tien sinh loi tu hoat dong dau tu cua quy bao hiem y te. 3. tai tro, vien tro cua cac to chuc, ca nhan trong nuoc va nuoc ngoai. 4. cac nguon thu hop phap khac.

1. quy bao hiem y te duoc quan ly tap trung, thong nhat, cong khai, minh bach va co su phan cap quan ly trong he thong to chuc bao hiem y te. 2. chinh phu quy dinh cu the viec quan ly quy bao hiem y te; quyet dinh nguon tai chinh de bao dam viec kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te trong truong hop mat can doi thu, chi quy bao hiem y te.

1. quy bao hiem y te duoc su dung cho cac muc dich sau day: a) thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te; b) chi phi quan ly bo may to chuc bao hiem y te theo dinh muc chi hanh chinh cua co quan nha nuoc; c) dau tu de bao toan va tang truong quy bao hiem y te theo nguyen tac an toan, hieu qua; d) lap quy du phong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te. quy du phong toi thieu bang tong chi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te cua hai quy truoc lien ke va toi da khong qua tong chi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te cua hai nam truoc lien ke. 2. truong hop cac tinh, thanh pho truc thuoc trung uong co so thu bao hiem y te lon hon so chi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te thi duoc su dung mot phan ket du de phuc vu kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te tai dia phuong. 3. chinh phu quy dinh cu the dieu nay.

1. duoc cap the bao hiem y te khi dong bao hiem y te. 2. lua chon co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te ban dau theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 26 cua luat nay. 3. duoc kham benh, chua benh. 4. duoc to chuc bao hiem y te thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh theo che do bao hiem y te. 5. yeu cau to chuc bao hiem y te, co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te va co quan lien quan giai thich, cung cap thong tin ve che do bao hiem y te. 6. khieu nai, to cao hanh vi vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem y te.

1. dong bao hiem y te day du, dung thoi han. 2. su dung the bao hiem y te dung muc dich, khong cho nguoi khac muon the bao hiem y te. 3. thuc hien cac quy dinh tai dieu 28 cua luat nay khi den kham benh, chua benh. 4. chap hanh cac quy dinh va huong dan cua to chuc bao hiem y te, co so kham benh, chua benh khi den kham benh, chua benh. 5. thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh cho co so kham benh, chua benh ngoai phan chi phi do quy bao hiem y te chi tra.
1. yeu cau to chuc bao hiem y te, co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen giai thich, cung cap thong tin ve che do bao hiem y te. 2. khieu nai, to cao hanh vi vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem y te.

1. lap ho so de nghi cap the bao hiem y te. 2. dong bao hiem y te day du, dung thoi han. 3. giao the bao hiem y te cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te. 4. cung cap day du, chinh xac thong tin, tai lieu co lien quan den trach nhiem thuc hien bao hiem y te cua nguoi su dung lao dong, cua dai dien cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te khi co yeu cau cua to chuc bao hiem y te, nguoi lao dong hoac dai dien cua nguoi lao dong. 5. chap hanh viec thanh tra, kiem tra ve viec thuc hien cac quy dinh cua phap luat ve bao hiem y te.

1. yeu cau nguoi su dung lao dong, dai dien cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te va nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te cung cap day du, chinh xac thong tin, tai lieu co lien quan den trach nhiem cua ho ve viec thuc hien bao hiem y te. 2. kiem tra, giam dinh viec thuc hien kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te; thu hoi, tam giu the bao hiem y te doi voi cac truong hop quy dinh tai dieu 20 cua luat nay. 3. yeu cau co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te cung cap ho so, benh an, tai lieu ve kham benh, chua benh de phuc vu cong tac giam dinh bao hiem y te. 4. tu choi thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te khong dung quy dinh cua luat nay hoac khong dung voi noi dung hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te. 5. yeu cau nguoi co trach nhiem boi thuong thiet hai cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te hoan tra chi phi kham benh, chua benh ma to chuc bao hiem y te da chi tra. 6. kien nghi voi co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen sua doi, bo sung chinh sach, phap luat ve bao hiem y te va xu ly to chuc, ca nhan vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem y te.

1. tuyen truyen, pho bien chinh sach, phap luat ve bao hiem y te. 2. huong dan ho so, thu tuc, to chuc thuc hien che do bao hiem y te bao dam nhanh chong, don gian va thuan tien cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te. 3. thu tien dong bao hiem y te va cap the bao hiem y te. 4. quan ly, su dung quy bao hiem y te. 5. ky hop dong kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te voi co so kham benh, chua benh. 6. thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te. 7. cung cap thong tin ve cac co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te va huong dan nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te lua chon co so kham benh, chua benh ban dau. 8. kiem tra chat luong kham benh, chua benh; giam dinh bao hiem y te. 9. bao ve quyen loi cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te; giai quyet theo tham quyen cac kien nghi, khieu nai, to cao ve che do bao hiem y te. 10. luu tru ho so, so lieu ve bao hiem y te theo quy dinh cua phap luat; ung dung cong nghe thong tin trong quan ly bao hiem y te, xay dung he co so du lieu quoc gia ve bao hiem y te. 11. to chuc thuc hien cong tac thong ke, bao cao, huong dan nghiep vu ve bao hiem y te; bao cao dinh ky hoac dot xuat khi co yeu cau ve quan ly, su dung quy bao hiem y te. 12. to chuc dao tao, boi duong nghiep vu, nghien cuu khoa hoc va hop tac quoc te ve bao hiem y te.

1. yeu cau to chuc bao hiem y te cung cap day du, chinh xac cac thong tin co lien quan den nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te, kinh phi kham benh, chua benh cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te tai co so kham benh, chua benh. 2. duoc to chuc bao hiem y te tam ung kinh phi va thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh theo hop dong kham benh, chua benh da ky. 3. kien nghi voi co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen xu ly to chuc, ca nhan vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem y te.

1. to chuc kham benh, chua benh bao dam chat luong voi thu tuc don gian, thuan tien cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te. 2. cung cap ho so benh an, tai lieu lien quan den kham benh, chua benh va thanh toan chi phi kham benh, chua benh cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te theo yeu cau cua to chuc bao hiem y te va co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen. 3. bao dam dieu kien can thiet cho to chuc bao hiem y te thuc hien cong tac giam dinh; phoi hop voi to chuc bao hiem y te trong viec tuyen truyen, giai thich ve che do bao hiem y te cho nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te. 4. kiem tra, phat hien va thong bao cho to chuc bao hiem y te nhung truong hop vi pham ve su dung the bao hiem y te; phoi hop voi to chuc bao hiem y te thu hoi, tam giu the bao hiem y te doi voi cac truong hop quy dinh tai dieu 20 cua luat nay. 5. quan ly va su dung kinh phi tu quy bao hiem y te theo dung quy dinh cua phap luat. 6. to chuc thuc hien cong tac thong ke, bao cao ve bao hiem y te theo quy dinh cua phap luat.

1. yeu cau to chuc bao hiem y te, co so kham benh, chua benh va nguoi su dung lao dong cung cap day du, chinh xac thong tin lien quan den che do bao hiem y te cua nguoi lao dong. 2. kien nghi voi co quan nha nuoc co tham quyen xu ly hanh vi vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem y te lam anh huong den quyen va loi ich hop phap cua nguoi lao dong, nguoi su dung lao dong.

1. tuyen truyen, pho bien chinh sach, phap luat ve bao hiem y te doi voi nguoi lao dong, nguoi su dung lao dong. 2. tham gia xay dung, kien nghi sua doi, bo sung chinh sach, phap luat ve bao hiem y te. 3. tham gia giam sat viec thi hanh phap luat ve bao hiem y te.
thanh tra y te thuc hien chuc nang thanh tra chuyen nganh ve bao hiem y te.

viec khieu nai va giai quyet khieu nai doi voi quyet dinh hanh chinh, hanh vi hanh chinh ve bao hiem y te, viec to cao va giai quyet to cao vi pham phap luat ve bao hiem y te duoc thuc hien theo quy dinh cua phap luat ve khieu nai, to cao.

1. tranh chap ve bao hiem y te la tranh chap lien quan den quyen, nghia vu va trach nhiem bao hiem y te giua cac doi tuong sau day: a) nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te theo quy dinh tai dieu 12 cua luat nay, nguoi dai dien cua nguoi tham gia bao hiem y te; b) to chuc, ca nhan dong bao hiem y te theo quy dinh tai khoan 1 dieu 13 cua luat nay; c) to chuc bao hiem y te; d) co so kham benh, chua benh bao hiem y te. 2. tranh chap ve bao hiem y te duoc giai quyet nhu sau: a) cac ben tranh chap co trach nhiem tu hoa giai ve noi dung tranh chap; b) truong hop hoa giai khong thanh thi cac ben tranh chap co quyen khoi kien tai toa an theo quy dinh cua phap luat.

1. nguoi nao co hanh vi vi pham cac quy dinh cua luat nay va cac quy dinh khac cua phap luat co lien quan den bao hiem y te thi tuy theo tinh chat, muc do vi pham ma bi xu ly ky luat, xu phat vi pham hanh chinh hoac bi truy cuu trach nhiem hinh su, neu gay thiet hai thi phai boi thuong theo quy dinh cua phap luat. 2. co quan, to chuc, nguoi su dung lao dong co trach nhiem dong bao hiem y te ma khong dong hoac dong khong day du theo quy dinh cua phap luat thi cung voi viec phai dong du so tien chua dong, con phai nop so tien lai trong thoi gian cham dong theo muc lai suat co ban do ngan hang nha nuoc cong bo; neu khong thuc hien thi theo yeu cau cua nguoi co tham quyen xu ly vi pham hanh chinh, ngan hang, to chuc tin dung khac, kho bac nha nuoc co trach nhiem trich tien tu tai khoan tien gui cua nguoi co trach nhiem dong bao hiem y te de nop so tien chua dong, cham dong va lai cua so tien nay vao tai khoan cua quy bao hiem y te.
